question: Henry was a pen pal with 7 people. He stopped being penpals with 4 of them. They each send 4 letters a week that are 10 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 7 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Henry is penpals with 7-4=<<7-4=3>>3 people
Thus he gets 3*4=<<3*4=12>>12 letters a week
So he writes 12*10=<<12*10=120>>120 pages a week
So he writes for 120*7=<<120*7=840>>840 minutes a week
So he writes 840/60=<<840/60=14>>14 hours a week
#### 14
